[Recipient.CheckImperialGrantTitleText1], increasing [Recipient.GetPossPronoun] opinion of you by §G$OPINION$§! and lowering your threat by §G$INFAMY$%§!.
[Recipient.CheckImperialGrantTitleText1], increasing [Recipient.GetPossPronoun] opinion of you by §G$OPINION$§! and lowering your threat by §G$INFAMY$%§!.
Appoint Governor
Appoint this character to govern a part of our realm
Appoint this character to govern a part of our realm. This will significantly improve their opinion of you.
Appoint §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§W as §Y[This.GetRulerTitle] of [ThirdPartyTitle.GetBaseName]§W
Grant Landed Title
Grant a landed title to the character
Grant one of your landed titles to another character. This will significantly improve their opinion of you.
Grant the §Y[ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName]§W to §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§W
Dismiss Governor

Attempt to dismiss §Y[Root.GetTitledName]§! from all held titles and offices. \nThis will lower [This.GetHerHis] opinion §R-60§! and the opinion of other members of [This.GetHerHis] dynasty by §R-15§!. \nIf [This.GetSheHe] chooses to refuse, [This.GetSheHe] might try to negotiate or rebel.

To my loyal subject [io_dismissed_governor.GetBestName],
I am afraid I must ask you to lay down command of the [io_primary_title.GetFullName]. [io_current_heir.GetBestName] has been chosen as your successor and will rule the [io_primary_title.GetFullName] from now on. For the good of the realm, I hope you accept this decision.

Sincerely,
[From.GetBestName]
It has been an honor to serve.
A gift of gold shall make him reconsider.
I will offer him a favor.
I will not give up what is rightfully mine!

[io_liege.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA],

Even though it grieves me greatly, I will accept your decision and lay down command of the [io_primary_title.GetFullName]. It has been an honor to serve the the realm. 
Sincerely,
[From.GetBestName]
Excellent.

[io_liege.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA]

Even though you have every right to decide who is best fit to rule the [io_primary_title.GetFullName], I still hope that there is a way to retain my position. I am an influential [io_dismissed_governor.GetManWoman], after all, and would consider it a personal favor - one you might have use of in the future.
Sincerely,
[From.GetBestName]
Very well. For a favor, [io_dismissed_governor.GetSheHe] may keep his position.
I have no need of a favor from [io_dismissed_governor.GetHerHim]

To the [GetFromRootCompliment] [io_dismissed_governor.GetTitledFirstName],
I hereby accept your offer. You may continue to rule the [io_primary_title.GetFullName] in exchange for a favor.

Sincerely,
[From.GetBestName]
Excellent.
You accept [io_liege.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s decision
[io_liege.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] is offered a gift
[io_liege.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] is offered a favor
Dismissed
